normalStyles.description: Regular usage for components on the screen like buttons, cards, images and dropdowns.

hoverStyles.description: Used for hover effects when the user's cursor is inside the area of the component. Primarily used for hover variants inside atomic components.

focusedStyles.description: Used for focused effects for drawing user attention and occasionally on sub-components when the user is performing nested activity inside the parent component (e.g., input dropdowns).
